name: FileNSeek
description:
A file is hiding in your file system, and it's your job to eliminate it!

In order to play, download the executable file and execute it. If you click it or execute it with no arguments on the command line, the file will be hidden inside the directory where the executable is or in one of its child directories.

If you execute it from the command line, you can adjust some parameters with the following syntax:

./FileNSeek [difficulty] [directory]

- difficulty [0-1]: determines how deep the file can be.

- directory: directory which will contain the file, either inside itself or inside a child directory.

This was a small project created for a short game jam with the theme "break the system".
